item.title: Careers in social services: opportunities and employability
item.description: INT: The social services sector is growing and this means there are opportunities for people looking for a new career. Whether thatâ€™s changing jobs, or people who are just starting out. So what are these opportunities and what role can employment support workers have in helping this important workforce to grow sustainably? We speak to Kerry Cannon, learning and development adviser at the Scottish Social Services Council and Susie Ferguson, partnership manager at the Department of Work and Pensions, about current recruitment opportunities and the important role employability organisations can have in supporting these.
